Class JavaUtil

java.lang.Object
javautility.JavaUtil
public class JavaUtil extends Object
This class provides utility methods for generating random numbers, timestamps, and various fake data such as names, addresses, phone numbers, etc. It uses the Faker library to generate realistic fake data.
Since:
2025-06-01
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ravi Shankar

  • Method Details

    • randomNumber

      public static long randomNumber(int digit)
      Generates a random number with the specified number of digits. The digit parameter should be between 1 and 10.
      Parameters:
      digit - The number of digits for the random number.
      Returns:
      A random long number with the specified number of digits.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the digit is not within the range of 1-10.

    • getIncrement

      public static long getIncrement()
      Generates a random number with the specified range.
      Parameters:
      lower - The lower bound of the random number range.
      upper - The upper bound of the random number range.
      Returns:
      A random long number within the specified range.

    • timeStamp

      public static String timeStamp()
      Generates a timestamp in the format "Stamp-YYYY-MM-dd-HH-mm-ss".
      Returns:
      A string representing the current timestamp.

    • getDate

      public static String getDate(String format)
      Generates a date string in the specified format.
      Parameters:
      format - The format for the date string.
      Returns:
      A string representing the current date in the specified format.

    • getDate

      public static String getDate()
      Generates a date string in the format "dd-MM-YYYY".
      Returns:
      A string representing the current date in the format "dd-MM-YYYY".

    • getModDateByDay

      public static String getModDateByDay(int day)
      Generates a modified date string based on the current date and the specified number of days, months, or years.
      Parameters:
      day - The number of days to modify the current date. Positive for future dates, negative for past dates.
      Returns:
      A string representing the modified date in the format "dd-MM-YYYY".

    • getModDateByMonth

      public static String getModDateByMonth(int month)
      Generates a modified date string based on the current date and the specified number of months or years.
      Parameters:
      month - The number of months to modify the current date. Positive for future dates, negative for past dates.
      Returns:
      A string representing the modified date in the format "dd-MM-YYYY".

    • getModDateByYear

      public static String getModDateByYear(int year)
      Generates a modified date string based on the current date and the specified number of years.
      Parameters:
      year - The number of years to modify the current date. Positive for future dates, negative for past dates.
      Returns:
      A string representing the modified date in the format "dd-MM-YYYY".
